content.query:
-- Demo
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://covidanalysisstorage.blob.core.windows.net/covidanalysisfilesystem/covid/sql/bronze/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2)
WITH (
        [dateRep] varchar (10),
        [day] int,
        [month] int,
        [year] int,
        [cases] int,
        [deaths] int,
        countriesAndTerritories varchar (100),
        geoId varchar (100),
        countryterritoryCode varchar (100),
        popData2018 varchar(20),
        continentExp varchar (100)
) AS [r]
